\#### The published \[paper\](https://www.cell.com/current-biology/pdf/S0960-9822(23)00071-4.pdf) and \[code\](https://github.com/cdkuempel/Kuempel_chicken_salmon) are available on-line. We quantified pressures of commercial broiler chicken and farmed salmon production including greenhouse gas emissions, freshwater use, nutrient pollution, and spatial disturbance to compare cumulative environmental footprints across the land and sea.
